channel.title: Help! read and try to help!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I did post this a while ago, but nobody actually helped or replied so here it is On my client there is a big runescape logo at the top, someone told me to use a suite cache editor. But it asks me to upload the cache where is my cache? It may seem stupid but, i clicked the folder for my source and tried it but didn't work and the same as for the client folder. and I'd also like to know how to delete the flames and change the login box on the client. Thanks!
BTW in the attachment, that is the background I set myself it was different. so please don't tell me to change it and the logo goes away.

item.title: Help! read and try to help!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

I removed the line anintarray851 etc.
I added in the other code in it’s place.
and it says “An error has occured whilst loading RuneScape”

What am I doing wrong?

Read full topic
item.source: Help! read and try to help!

item.title: Help! read and try to help!
item.dc:creator: @freeky freeky
item.description:
@freeky wrote:

ok do this to get rid of the flames

in client.java search for this:

anIntArray851 = new int[256];       starting at that line, comment that line through and including

remove that.

for(int j4 = 0; j4 < 64; j4++)
            anIntArray853[j4 + 192] = 0xffffff;

To change the login box try searching for sprites in the folder probably will find it then look for the current log in box and replace it with ur make sure it’s got the same name tho.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! read and try to help!

item.title: Help! read and try to help!

item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

This is client help.

Thanks,
Denoria.

Read full topic

so here it is
On my client there is a big runescape logo at the top, someone told me to use a suite cache editor.
